name: Sapurai
description:
YOU KIRED MY FATHERU. PREPERU TO DIE!

Play as Sapurai, a Samurai Frog in a quest to avenge his dead father. Kill dangerously venomous enemies and survive the poisoned tower as long as you can!

Team
  • Art & Intro Video: Alexandre Santos
  • 3D Models & Texturing: Bernardo Braga
  • Programming: Leonardo Tagliaro
  • Game Design & Sound Effects: Jessica Lorencetti
  • Game Design & Programming: Rodrigo Buske
